Name: MPI_Cart_get
Description: MPI_Cart_get retrieves the information about the cartesian topology of a communicator.

Parameters.Name: dimension_number
Parameters.Description: The number of dimensions in the cartesian grid.

Parameters.Name: dimensions
Parameters.Description: The array in which store the number of processes in each dimension of the cartesian topology of the communicator passed.

Parameters.Name: periods
Parameters.Description: The array in which store the periodicity for each dimension. It indicates, for each dimension, if it is periodic (true) or non-periodic (false).

Parameters.Name: coords
Parameters.Description: The array in which store the coordinates of the calling MPI process in the cartesian topology of the communicator specified.

Return.Description:
The error code returned from the coordinates retrieval.

  • MPI_SUCCESS: the routine successfully completed.
